definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: The output of the sample - and - hold system now goes into an analog - to - digital converter .
sentences.chinese: 取樣和保持系統的輸出現在又進入一個模數轉換器。

sentences.english: Analog to digital converters (ADCs) are the key blocks in many electronic products.
sentences.chinese: 模數轉換器是很多現代電子設備的核心電路模塊。
